title: Authentic Bistros of Paris
content:
Anyone know what's used on this? Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BistroParis\_cover.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108143002/http:/typophile.com/files/BistroParis_cover_0.jpg) | 83.23 KB |
author: _jimmy_

comments.content: That book is part of a series designed by [Louise Fili](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108143002/http:/www.louisefili.com/books/b8.html). The lettering could well be custom. [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108143002/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/) have plenty of similar vintage glass sign fonts.
